block0.text: Wake up with a warm cup of traditional Arabic coffee (Gahwa) as the sun rises.

block1.text: Cross the Dubai Creek on a traditional abra before enjoying lunch in Dubai’s historical district.

block2.text: Discover glittering gold and precious stones at the Gold Souk, one of the world's largest gold markets.

block3.text: Dine 442m above ground in At.mosphere, the highest restaurant in the world.

day1.block0: Take a hot air balloon ride over the desert, and watch the sun rise over the dunes.

block1.text: Enjoy relaxation at its finest with a signature experience at one of Dubai's best spas.

block2.text: Take a break for lunch and enjoy international cuisine with a soothing sea view.

block3.text: Enjoy the latest show at Dubai Opera, where they have everything from opera to stand-up comedy.

block0.text: Take off on a once-in-a-lifetime adventure with the family and explore Dubai’s desert.

block1.text: Experience a traditional Bedouin lunch with locals and learn about Emirati heritage.

block2.text: Enjoy fun desert activities for the whole family, from sandboarding to quad biking.

block3.text: Watch the sun set behind the dunes while you set up camp for the night.

block0.text: Splash about and escape the heat at one of Dubai’s best waterparks.

block1.text: Enjoy precious family moments while dining at one of the city’s award-winning restaurants.

block2.text: Stop by the Dubai Aquarium & Underwater Zoo for memorable marine moments.

block3.text: Make sure to catch the dancing Dubai Fountains - a spectacular sight you won't forget.

block0.text: Fasten your seatbelts and burn rubber at the Dubai Autodrome, with a supercar driving experience.

block1.text: Enjoy a breathtaking adventure with a thrilling ride through the desert dunes.

block2.text: Find the perfect picnic spot while hiking and exploring Hatta’s mountains.

block3.text: Escape the busy city and camp out under the stars, sharing stories with friends.

block0.text: Enjoy some early morning surfing or paddleboarding in the waters off Kite Beach.

block1.text: Embark on an underwater adventure, and go diving with one of the local scuba schools.

block2.text: Jump out of a plane at one of the world’s best skydiving drop zones above the Palm Jumeirah.

block3.text: Head to one of the city’s top food trucks for a well-deserved meal at sunset.

block0.text: Head off for a desert tour with locals sharing stories of the UAE's past.

block1.text: Discover traditional Arabian art, including calligraphy, wall decor, carpets and henna.

block2.text: Check out Burj Khalifa, the world’s tallest building, and try to fit it into a photograph.

block3.text: Visit Etihad Museum, which chronicles the history of the UAE since its birth in 1971.

block0.text: Enjoy breakfast at the Sheikh Mohammed Centre for Cultural Understanding (SMCCU), and learn about Emirati culture.

block1.text: Cross the Dubai Creek on an abra and talk to the merchants as the souks open up.

block2.text: Induge in lunch at the Al Fahidi Historical Neighbourhood, one of the oldest areas in Dubai.

block3.text: Catch the latest show at Dubai Opera, where there's everything from opera to stand-up comedy.

block0.text: Have breakfast while taking in the panoramic view of the Creek from your private terrace.

block1.text: Enjoy relaxation at its finest with a signature experience at one of Dubai's best spas.

block2.text: Visit Etihad Museum, which chronicles the history of the UAE since its birth in 1971.

block3.text: Dine out at 360, and watch the sun sinking in to the waters of the Arabian Gulf.

block0.text: Start the day with some fresh juice at the poolside while the sun rises over the city.

block1.text: Shop 'til you drop and find some bargains at one of Dubai’s many malls.

block2.text: Enjoy a yoga session by the sea and relax while admiring the city’s skyline.

block3.text: Take in the Dubai Fountains, the world’s largest and most spectacular choreographed fountains, from a cafe's terrace.

block0.text: Head to Kite Beach for a sunrise run

block1.text: Bite into a delicious beachside lunch

block2.text: Get that adrenaline rush with an afternoon of watersports

block3.text: Watch the sunset by the Burj Al Arab and look back at a long day on the beach.

block0.text: Savour a delectable breakfast and coffee before a busy day

block1.text: Take in the sights and sounds of Dubai from a yacht ride

block2.text: Dive, sail or jet-ski - take your pick from Dubai's many marine thrills

block3.text: Say goodbye with a sunset stroll by the sea
